episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses and Repetition for Emphasis (Argumentum ad Nauseam) Internet Dangers
episodes.description:
This video exposes the propagandists from the Writing Department of the Watchtower Bible and Tract Society using "Repetiton For Emphasis" to hold captive the minds of the Jehovah's Witnesses in a pen of false "security" by repeating incessantly over the past ten years the words "internet" and "dangers," until the two words are synonymous, which is another propaganda technique called "Use Association," virtually guaranteeing to instill such a powerful phobia that the majority of their victims will never find videos such as this one on the internet revealing how this propaganda is being implemented, all in the name of God.

These are two very powerful mind control techniques. When used simultaneously, they create a synergistic effect on the minds of the unsuspecting cult members.
Source: http://www.orange-papers.org/orange-propaganda.html

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses and Hypnotic Bait and Switch
episodes.description: This video shows how the propaganda technique "Hypnotic Bait and Switch" is accomplished and used as a mind control tool by psychologically destructive cults in order to promote thought reform.
